name: 60 Seconds For The Death
description:
You are a White cube. Your objective is to collect all the yellow orbs. by collecting all the orbs You win the game, that simple.

CONTROLS:  Arrow buttons to Move.

Z To jump 

X To Interact With Things 

Alt+Enter To FullScreen.

-Ballmint

IMPORTANT:

The faster you maker the second jump, Higher you will jump.

No licence Required.
